title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.7 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.7 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of Part
7005 of this Subtitle, all prisoners shall be provided at admission with an
issue of personal hygiene items. (b) Clothing shall be issued to prisoners
when requested or required pursuant to the requirements of Part 7005 of this

Subtitle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7002.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
